metadata.title: CVE-2014-8146
metadata.description: The resolveImplicitLevels function in common/ubidi.c in the Unicode Bidirectional Algorithm implementation in ICU4C in International Components for Unicode (ICU) before 55.1 does not properly track directionally isolated pieces of text, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted text.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 12 is installed
